QuestData.Title: Lightning Rod
QuestData.Description: <Overspark's tiny hands move like lightning, affixing coils and tubes to the device before cramming it into a parachute pack.>$B$BPut this on.$B$BJust up the hill you'll find the front half of the Skyfire - and the big nest of storm drakes it crashed into! We can use the energy from those drakes to charge the transponder.$B$BYou'll have to incite them, of course, but the device should draw most of the power.$B$BThe probability of you being electrocuted is well within acceptable parameters!
QuestData.LogDescription: Charge the Transponder by absorbing Storm Drake lightning attacks.
QuestData.RewardText: Alright... I'm reading full power on the transponder.$B$BNow for an antenna...
